column1:
yellowsubmarine,"2022-01-08T07:11:10.083Z","A small castle, great house","

The accessibility on the castle makes this set even more worth. The depth and height of each floor is chosen well so you can have access to every space in the room.
3 floors, each one is easy to remove and play on each separately.
Ease to remove interiors in order to redecorate.
The additional sides with pier and boat,
column2: bakery stand with goods and lamp post are nice.

column1: Great figures with different style of Anna, Elsa and Kristoff.
You get quite a lot of different options to play on this set. The quality of the brickcolours
column2: are good. They do not change within in a colour.&nbsp
